price: Allah will mock them[11] and prolong them to wander blindly in their transgression.
arabic: ٱللَّهُ يَسۡتَهۡزِئُ بِهِمۡ وَيَمُدُّهُمۡ فِي طُغۡيَٰنِهِمۡ يَعۡمَهُونَ
footnotes: [11] Allah mocks them in response to their mocking Muslims.
